data.title: Tiffany Boone
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Tiffany Boone on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 49% The Midnight Sky (2020)

Lowest Rated: 48% Beautiful Creatures (2013)

Birthday: Aug 27, 1987

Birthplace: Baltimore, Maryland, USA

Born and raised in Baltimore, Mayland, Tiffany Boone refused to let her life be defined the murder of her father when she was a young child. Boone graduated from California Institute of the Arts in 2009, and decided to stay and work. Her first mainstream exposure came in 2012, when she played a two-episode arc on the police procedural "Southland" (NBC, 2009; TNT, 2010-13). The experience propelled her into a few more supporting roles on shows like "Suburgatory" (ABC, 2011-14) and "Grey's Anatomy" (ABC, 2005-), in addition to a supporting role in the feature film adaptation "Beautiful Creatures" (2013). Her most prominent role to date came in 2014, when she appeared in the second season of "The Following" (Fox, 2013-15), playing one of the acolytes of serial killer Joe Carroll. After her character was killed off, Boone continued to appear in supporting roles on shows like "Major Crimes" (TNT, 2012-), and "Once Upon A Time" (ABC, 2011-), in addition to a recurring role on the drama "Complications" (USA Network, 2015).

Highest rated movies

49% The Midnight Sky

48% Beautiful Creatures
